name: True Driver
description:
True Driver is a singleplayer 3D car game with a bunch of challenges. You can choose between 4 cars with which you can accomplish the challenges!
There are 3 modes to play: FREEMODE, COUNTDOWN and HELIRACE.

FREEMODE


Take a ride and enjoy the freedom. Explore the area, break the fence of your neighbour or accept challenges!
Each location has its challenges. The fun begins.
Freemode has available an option of music in radio, map for orientation and ofcourse slowmotion.

There are 2 maps + old version of the first map from first version of the game.
There are 47 challenges in this mode at all.

CHALLENGES:
Collect the coins - Collect all the coins in the shortest possible time
Fuel Trouble - You're running out of fuel! Collect all the canisters until you run out of gas.
You can't touch this - Collect all the checkpoints while not touching the bars blocking your way
S.O.S - Find your lost car using sound

COUNTDOWN


Get ready, start!
Get to the finish line before the time runs out! One mistake can cost everything. Slow motion could be useful.
Go to several locations, from the desert to the big city, find the way and win the race!

There are 16 levels and every level is different.

HELIRACE


Can a car beat a helicopter? Can you reach the destination before the helicopter? We'll see.
Race with the helicopter, don't get lost and get to the finish as first. Good luck!

Helirace has 4 maps for beating the helicopter.

TUTORIAL


A short Tutorial will show you all the functions, modes and controls.
